user.title: Setup Prana Recuperator connection

error.unable_to_connect: Unable to connect to the remote device. See logs for details
error.discovery_error: Discovery failed. See logs for more details

init.description:
Choose existing device to edit or add a new one. 
NOTE: The discovery process might take some time (up to 10 seconds)
init.title: Prana Hub Options

discover.title: Devices discovery
discover.description:
Below are the the lis of discovered devices available for pairing. 
If you don't see your device make sure it is turned on, located nearby and is not connected to any other device already. 
If you still can't find yur device you can return back and add it manually by mac address.
